Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition -- 3.18 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Acadia, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a three and eighteen hundredths (3.18) mills tax on all property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $1,370,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, for the purpose of constructing and maintaining roads and bridges in the Parish?
